ministry.name: Streaming Media Ministry
ministry.overview: The Streaming Media Ministry provides access to both live and archived services in Real Audio and Real Video format.

long-description.p: Currently we Live Stream our 3rd service on Sunday 11:30 a.m., our mid-week service on Wednesday 7:00 p.m., and our College and Career service on Friday 7:30 p.m. The Real Audio archives are constantly being updated to provide access to all of the past messages. The Real Video messages for the past two services are also available. The Streaming Media Ministry also provides a closed circuit feed to the New Parents room enabling New Parents to attend services and to their children. So whether you are unable to make it to service or you just want to review, log on and be blessed.
